name: calliope-scenarios-2050
description: Calliope output constrained to SENTINEL scenarios

fields.name: locs
fields.description: The region the data corresponds to.  This index column is needed when converting a data package to the IAMC format.

fields.name: techs
fields.description: Descriptor or name of the technology.

fields.name: unit
fields.description: This column is used to fill in the "unit" column when converting a data package to the IAMC format.
